memo:
BILL NUMBER:S2307

TITLE OF BILL:
An act to amend the general obligations law, in relation to requiring
ski area operators to provide helmets on-site for optional rental by
skiers and snowboarders

PURPOSE/SUMMARY OF PROVISIONS:
This bill requires ski area operators to provide helmets for optional
rental by skiers and snowboarders.

JUSTIFICATION:
Several ski areas in Vermont, New Hampshire, and other states choose
between mandating or offering as personal option the wearing of helmets
for skiing and snowboarding. When out-of-state skiers or native New
Yorkers choose to exercise this option the necessary equipment is
frequently not available.

FISCAL IMPLICATIONS:
None to the state.

EFFECTIVE DATE:
This act shall take effect on the first day of November next succeeding
the date on which it shall have become a law.
